SELECT t.product_id productId, t.product_name productName, t.amount amount FROM product_info t

SELECT t.count count, t.unit_price unitPrice, t.total_amount totalAmount, t.goods_id goodsId, a.goods_name goodsName, b.category_name categoryName, b.category_id categoryId, b.category_code categoryCode FROM product_goods_info t INNER JOIN goods_info a ON t.goods_id = a.goods_id INNER JOIN category_info b ON a.category_id = b.category_id where t.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY a.category_id, b.category_code
